description: This file defines UI input components (Input and Textarea) for a Qwik-based web application, including accessible error and hint messaging.

methods.name: Input
methods.description: A labeled input component with accessible error/hint messaging.

parameters.name: props
parameters.description: Properties for the input component, extending QwikIntrinsicElements['input']

methods.name: Textarea
methods.description: A labeled textarea component with accessible error/hint messaging.

parameters.name: props
parameters.description: Properties for the textarea component, extending QwikIntrinsicElements['textarea']
